title: Unveiling Stripe-shaped Charge Modulations in Doped Mott Insulators
authors: Ning Xia, Yuchen Guo, Shuo Yang
abstract:
Inspired by recent experimental findings, we investigate various scenarios of
the doped Hubbard model with impurity potentials. We calculate the lattice
Green's function in a finite-size cluster and then map it to the continuum real
space, which allows for a direct comparison with scanning-tunneling-microscopy
measurements on the local density of states. Our simulations successfully
reproduce experimental data, including the characteristic stripe- and
ladder-shaped structures observed in cuprate systems. Moreover, our results
establish a connection between previous numerical findings on stripe-ordered
ground states and experimental observations, thereby providing new insights
into doped Mott insulators.
